title: Monster & Creature Sound Effects
description: The Monster & Creature Sound Effects Collection includes creepy creature screams, and sound effect samples perfectly suited for movies or computer games. A variety of different groans, grunts, shouts, growls, and more.
longDescription:
The Monster & Creature Sound Effects Collection is a frighteningly complete virtual horror zoo that features a total of 441 different sound effects. This compilation features a wide range of distinct groans, grunts, yells, growls, and other sounds that are characteristically animalistic. The sound effects were developed to be ready to use as soon as the package was opened; nevertheless, they are also easily adaptable for usage as building parts in additional sound design projects. This collection is ideal for anyone who wants to add a spooky atmosphere to their audio production in a simple and effective way.


Alien Language, Bat, Bear, Bird, Demon, Ethereal Being, Goblin, Insectoid, Monster, Mutant, Nanobots, Parasite, Predator, Robot, Sea Monster, Skeleton, Slime, Spider, Swamp Creature, Troll, and Zombie are just some of the noises that are included in this collection. Each sound has been meticulously crafted to be as lifelike and horrifying as is humanly possible, giving sound designers a broad variety of possibilities to work with. This collection is sure to offer you with the appropriate sound effects to bring your horror movie, video game, or any other audio production to life. Whether you're working on a film, game, or other type of audio production, this collection is for you.


DEMO SOUNDS
